resources.string: Try for 1 minute to make the maximum number of push-ups (chest), rest 15 seconds and do the maximum number of squats (legs) in 2 minutes, rest 15 seconds and do the maximum amount of sit-ups (press) for 3 minutes. Do not embellish your results, if you start with the wrong level, it is possible to significantly reduce the effectiveness of the training. Even if your initial result will be more than modest, do not worry, you can achieve maximum success, if you are honest with ourselves, from the beginning to the end of the training.
Do you really want to start a new training plan? The current progress will be lost!
You successfully finished the workout. I\'m proud of you! You are the hero of the day!

Sportify is a 6 month program that will insure you to loose fat quickly and gain more muscle all this with only 3 exercises synchronized with resting time in between also the app provides 3 categories for the beginners the advanced and the expert so our app will be suitable for you.
Take a break, stretch and prepare for the next training session
You have no active plan. Press \'Start\' button to start a new one.
You successfully finished the training plan. To start a new one press \'Start\'.
Make %1$s push-ups (chest), then %2$s squats (legs), then %3$s sit-ups (press) and press \'Done\' when complete
Take a break, stretch and prepare for the next session
5 or less push-ups, squats and sit-ups
20 or more push-ups, squats and sit-ups
